text: Why was Kelly Rowland in tears after birthday lunch with Beyonce? She was celebrating her birthday with best friend and superstar Beyonce but soon after Kelly Rowland's joy turned to pain. The singer was seen in floods of tears outside Gjelina Restaurant on trendy Abbott Kinney Boulevard in the Venice area after her birthday lunch. It's unclear what caused the upset, but Kelly suddenly appeared overwhelmed by her emotions as sobbed away in the street in LA.
